meanings.definition: A point or line where two or more things intersect
meanings.sent1: At the intersections of the lines, we found the meeting point.
meanings.sent2: The map showed the intersections of the roads in the city.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces found their intersections, creating a perfect match.
meanings.sent4: The intersections of fate brought them together at just the right moment.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully highlighted the intersections of colors to create a beautiful painting.

meanings.definition: A place where roads or paths cross
meanings.sent1: We stopped at the intersections to check the street signs.
meanings.sent2: The traffic lights controlled the flow of vehicles at the intersections.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel paused at the intersections, unsure which way to go.
meanings.sent4: The intersections of the hiking trails led to breathtaking views.
meanings.sent5: The city was bustling with activity at the intersections of the main streets.

meanings.definition: The act or process of intersecting
meanings.sent1: The intersections of the lines occurred at precise angles.
meanings.sent2: Careful planning was needed to avoid collisions at the intersections.
